resources.string: Version: %1$s
Network
No internet connection.
There is something wrong with your connection.\nCheck your connection by accessing some webpage through the browser.
Select
Permission denied
Back
Settings
To proceed you need permission to use the device accounts manager. Otherwise it will not be possible to use this function.
You need permission to use the accounts manager. &settings; Contacts.
If you deny access to the camera, you will not be able to use the scanner function to scan the QR code or take a picture of the contents that will be stored in the containers.
For QR Code reader or taking a picture of the contents that will be stored in the containers, it is necessary to give permission to use the camera. &settings; Camera.
If you deny access to the device location will not be possible to find your current location.
To find your current location is necessary permission to use the device\'s GPS. &settings; Location.
If you deny access to the device\'s microphone, you can not use this function.
To use this feature, permission is required to use the device\'s microphone. &settings; Microphone.
If you deny access to the telephony feature, you will not be able to use this feature.
To use this function, you must have permission to use the device\'s telephony features. &settings; Phone.
If you deny access to the device\'s sensors, you can not use this feature.
Permission is required for this function to use the sensors in the device. &settings; Body sensors.
If you deny access to the SMS feature, you will not be able to use this feature.
This role requires permission to use the SMS features.. &settings; SMS.
If access to the storage of the device is denied, you will not be able to save pictures taken of the content.
To save pictures taken of the content, permission to use the storage of the device is required. &settings; Storage.
Account permission required.
Permission to access the camera required.
Necessary permission for location.
Necessary permission for microphone.
Permission is required for telephony resources.
Permission is required for sensors.
Permission is required for SMS resources.
Storage permission required.
Permission granted.
